page.title: 14INTERESTING BUILDINGS
page.content: {THE OLD SMIDDY The old smiddy is an 18th century building maintained as a working concern,complete with resident blacksmith,by the National Trust for Scotland.It was officially re-opened in 1984. {THE BLACK BULL INN A cobbled street leads from The Smiddy down to Black Bull House,an old 18th century inn.It is now a private house. {WRIGHT PARK On the old road behind Kippen lies Wright Park,an old country mansion house dating from 1750.It was from here that the young widow and heiress Jean Kay was abducted by Rob Roy's son Robin Oig.Unfortunately,she died and he was executed.
